vernac_cmds: Variable ptM' : Z_ w * Z_ w * Z_ (2 ^ w).
Hypothesis t_M : t = w - p \/ M = 1.
Hypothesis M'_M : M' = 2 ^ (p + w) / M mod 2 ^ w.
Local Hint Resolve le_0_w lt02w le02w : a.
Local Hint Resolve le_0_p le_0_l lt_l_2w le_0_v lt_v_2w : a.
Let r' := ltw d M_in_Z_ r (minusw r M_in_Z_).
Let r'' := ltw r' M_in_Z_ r' (minusw r' M_in_Z_).
Let r''' := ltw r'' M_in_Z_ r'' (minusw r'' M_in_Z_).
Lemma l_eq : u = x mod 2 ^ w.
Lemma s_eq : _Z s = x mod 2 ^ w / 2 ^ p.
apply Zle_lt_trans with ((2 ^ p - 1) * 2 ^ w + (2 ^ w - 1)).
Local Hint Resolve lt_x_xmax le_x_xmax : a.
Local Hint Resolve le_0_wm1 lt_0_w : a.
Local Hint Resolve lt_p_w le_p_w le_0_wmp : a.
Lemma s'_eq : _Z s' = x mod 2 ^ w - x mod 2 ^ p.
replace (x mod 2 ^ p) with (x mod 2 ^ w mod 2 ^ p).
Lemma h_eq : _Z h = x / 2 ^ w * 2 ^ (w - p).
Lemma q_eq : _Z q = x / 2 ^ p * (2 ^ (p + w) / M mod 2 ^ w) / 2 ^ w.
Local Hint Resolve le_M_2pp le_1_p lt_0_p le_0_pm1 : a.
replace (2 ^ p) with (1 * M + (2 ^ p - M)).
Lemma large_M'_eq : 2 ^ w + (2 ^ (p + w) / M) mod 2 ^ w = 2 ^ (p + w) / M.
transitivity (2 ^ (p + w) / M / 2 ^ w * 2 ^ w + (2 ^ (p + w) / M) mod 2 ^ w).
Lemma q'_eq_pre : _Z q' = (x / 2 ^ p * (2 ^ (p + w) / M) / 2 ^ w) mod 2 ^ w.
Lemma mod_ab_mod : forall z a b m : Z, 0 < m -> z = a \/ z = b -> z mod m = a mod m \/ z mod m = b mod m.
intros z a b m H H0.
elim H0; intro H1; rewrite H1; tauto.
Lemma q'_eq : _Z q' = (x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p / M) mod 2 ^ w \/ _Z q' = (x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p / M - 1) mod 2 ^ w.
elim (Zle_lt_or_eq (x / 2 ^ p * (2 ^ p * 2 ^ w / M) / 2 ^ w) (x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p / M)).
Lemma y_eq : _Z y = x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p / M * M mod 2 ^ w \/ _Z y = (x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p / M * M - M) mod 2 ^ w.
elim q'_eq; intro H; rewrite H.
Lemma d_eq : _Z d = x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p mod M \/ _Z d = x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p mod M + M.
rewrite <- Zmod_minus_distr_l with (b := x mod 2 ^ p).
replace (x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p - (x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p / M * M - M)) with (x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p - x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p / M * M + M).
Lemma r_eq : _Z r = (_Z d + x mod 2 ^ p) mod 2 ^ w.
rewrite Zmod_minus_distr_l with (a := x mod 2 ^ w - x mod 2 ^ p).
replace (x - x mod 2 ^ p - _Z y + x mod 2 ^ p) with (x - _Z y).
Lemma r'_eq : _Z r' = x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p mod M + x mod 2 ^ p.
replace ((x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p) mod M + M + x mod 2 ^ p - M) with ((x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p) mod M + x mod 2 ^ p).
cut (0 <= x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p mod M).
Lemma r'_x : _Z r' = x mod M \/ _Z r' = x mod M + M \/ _Z r' = x mod M + M + M.
rewrite <- Zdivmod_split with (x := x mod 2 ^ p) (m := M).
rewrite Zplus_comm with (m := x mod 2 ^ p mod M).
elim (mod_plus (x - x mod 2 ^ p) (x mod 2 ^ p) M).
replace (x - x mod 2 ^ p + x mod 2 ^ p) with x.
replace (x - x mod 2 ^ p + x mod 2 ^ p) with x.
Lemma r''_eq : _Z r'' = x mod M \/ _Z r'' = x mod M + M.
intro H0; elim H0; intro H1.
intro H0; elim H0; intro H1.
absurd (x mod M + M + M < M).
Lemma r'''_eq : _Z r''' = x mod M.
replace (x mod M + M - M) with (x mod M).
Coercion Z_from_Mset (M : Mset) := proj1_sig (P := in_Mset) M.
Lemma Mset_l : forall M : Mset, 1 <= M.
Lemma Mset_r : forall M : Mset, M <= 2 ^ (w - 1).
Lemma logsuplew : forall (M : Mset), Zlog_sup M <= w.
Lemma xhex : forall (M : Mset) (x : Z_ (2 ^ (Zlog_sup M + w))), in_Z_ (2 ^ w) (x / 2 ^ w).
apply Zle_lt_trans with ((2 ^ (Zlog_sup M + w) - 1) / 2 ^ w).
Lemma xlex : forall x : Z, in_Z_ (2 ^ w) (x mod 2 ^ w).
Lemma M'ex : forall M : Mset, in_Z_ (2 ^ w) (2 ^ (Zlog_sup M + w) / M - 2 ^ w).
cut (2 ^ (Zlog_sup M + w) / M < 2 ^ w + 2 ^ w).
apply Zle_lt_trans with (((2 * M - 1) * 2 ^ w) / M).
Lemma p1ex_2le : forall M : Mset, in_Z_ w (Zlog_sup M).
Lemma pex : forall M : Mset, in_Z_ w (Zlog_sup M).
Lemma tex : forall M : Mset, in_Z_ w (w - Zlog_sup M - 1 / M).
Lemma in_Z__if_in_Mset : forall M : Mset, in_Z_ (2 ^ w) M.
Definition Z__from_Mset (M : Mset) := exist (in_Z_ (2 ^ w)) M (in_Z__if_in_Mset M).
Definition C (M : Mset) := ( exist (in_Z_ w) (Zlog_sup M) (pex M), exist (in_Z_ w) (w - Zlog_sup M - 1 / M) (tex M), exist (in_Z_ (2 ^ w)) (2 ^ (Zlog_sup M + w) / M - 2 ^ w) (M'ex M)).
Theorem ModRed_eq : forall (M : Mset) (x : Z_ (2 ^ (Zlog_sup M + w))), ModRed M (C M) (exist (in_Z_ (2 ^ w)) (x / 2 ^ w) (xhex M x)) (exist (in_Z_ (2 ^ w)) (x mod 2 ^ w) (xlex x)) = x mod M.
rewrite <- modred with (x := 2 ^ (Zlog_sup M + w) / M - 2 ^ w) (m := 2 ^ w).
apply Zle_lt_trans with ((2 ^ (Zlog_sup M + w) - 1) / 2 ^ w).
Lemma xheex : forall (M : Mset) (h : Z_ (2 ^ Zlog_sup M)), in_Z_ (2 ^ w) h.
Lemma xleex : forall (u : Z_ (2 ^ w)), in_Z_ (2 ^ w) u.
Theorem ModRed_eq2 : forall (M : Mset) (v : Z_ (2 ^ Zlog_sup M)) (u : Z_ (2 ^ w)), ModRed M (C M) (exist (in_Z_ (2 ^ w)) v (xheex M v)) (exist (in_Z_ (2 ^ w)) u (xleex u)) = (2 ^ w * v + u) mod M.
rewrite <- modred with (x := 2 ^ (Zlog_sup M + w) / M - 2 ^ w) (m := 2 ^ w).

command: apply Zle_lt_trans with ((2 ^ p - 1) * 2 ^ w + (2 ^ w - 1)).
replace (x mod 2 ^ p) with (x mod 2 ^ w mod 2 ^ p).
replace (2 ^ p) with (1 * M + (2 ^ p - M)).
transitivity (2 ^ (p + w) / M / 2 ^ w * 2 ^ w + (2 ^ (p + w) / M) mod 2 ^ w).
intros z a b m H H0.
elim H0; intro H1; rewrite H1; tauto.
elim (Zle_lt_or_eq (x / 2 ^ p * (2 ^ p * 2 ^ w / M) / 2 ^ w) (x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p / M)).
elim q'_eq; intro H; rewrite H.
rewrite <- Zmod_minus_distr_l with (b := x mod 2 ^ p).
replace (x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p - (x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p / M * M - M)) with (x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p - x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p / M * M + M).
rewrite Zmod_minus_distr_l with (a := x mod 2 ^ w - x mod 2 ^ p).
replace (x - x mod 2 ^ p - _Z y + x mod 2 ^ p) with (x - _Z y).
replace ((x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p) mod M + M + x mod 2 ^ p - M) with ((x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p) mod M + x mod 2 ^ p).
cut (0 <= x / 2 ^ p * 2 ^ p mod M).
rewrite <- Zdivmod_split with (x := x mod 2 ^ p) (m := M).
rewrite Zplus_comm with (m := x mod 2 ^ p mod M).
elim (mod_plus (x - x mod 2 ^ p) (x mod 2 ^ p) M).
replace (x - x mod 2 ^ p + x mod 2 ^ p) with x.
replace (x - x mod 2 ^ p + x mod 2 ^ p) with x.
intro H0; elim H0; intro H1.
intro H0; elim H0; intro H1.
absurd (x mod M + M + M < M).
replace (x mod M + M - M) with (x mod M).
apply Zle_lt_trans with ((2 ^ (Zlog_sup M + w) - 1) / 2 ^ w).
cut (2 ^ (Zlog_sup M + w) / M < 2 ^ w + 2 ^ w).
apply Zle_lt_trans with (((2 * M - 1) * 2 ^ w) / M).
rewrite <- modred with (x := 2 ^ (Zlog_sup M + w) / M - 2 ^ w) (m := 2 ^ w).
apply Zle_lt_trans with ((2 ^ (Zlog_sup M + w) - 1) / 2 ^ w).
rewrite <- modred with (x := 2 ^ (Zlog_sup M + w) / M - 2 ^ w) (m := 2 ^ w).
